Metadata

Ensure that resources hosted on agency websites use the mandatory minimum set of AGLS metadata properties for the Australian Government. The AGLS Metadata Standard was published as Australian Standard (AS) 5044-2010 in 2010 and is endorsed by the National Archives of Australia for improving the visibility and availability of online resources.

The National Archives of Australia has FAQ on applying AGLS in Australian Government departments as well as online services to validate existing metadata and generate new metadata.

Guidance on website records management requirements is also available.
